hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:This is the 'Umra of which we have taken advantage. So he who has not the sacrificial animal with him should get out of the state of Ihram completely, for 'Umra has been incorporated in Hajj until the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ الْعُمْرَةِ فِي أَشْهُرِ الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to perform 'Umrah during the months of Hajj
